Healing Font.name: Healing Font
Healing Font.flavor: A short prayer imbues your weapon with healing power, so that whenever it strikes an enemy it heals an ally.
Healing Font.effect: Until the end of this encounter, when you attack on your turn and hit at least one enemy, you heal an ally. Choose one ally within 10 squares of you. That ally regains a number of hit points equal to 1d6 x your Wisdom modifier.

Warding Blow.name: Warding Blow
Warding Blow.flavor: You strike a foe you have challenged, bringing hope and encouragement to nearby allies.
Warding Blow.target: One creature that is marked by you
Warding Blow.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and each ally within 5 squares of you can make a saving throw.

Life-Giving Smite.name: Life-Giving Smite
Life-Giving Smite.flavor: You imbue your weapon with radiant power, and as you strike at a foe the power of the attack heals an ally.
Life-Giving Smite.effect: Choose one ally within 10 squares of you. The ally can spend a healing surge. Add your Charisma modifier to the hit points regained.
